attributes.action: recongise that Ronnie Biggs is now a frail, sick, old man and
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
accept that as a result he is no longer a threat to anyone.  

He was part of a gang that stole £2.6m in 1963 (roughly equivalent to £39m using the RPI today - or the cost of about 10 days war in Iraq). 

He is only serving the sentence he does because the government of the day was affronted by the crime committed - the sentence is far more severe than would have been handed down to anyone committing a crime against the private sector (see Fred Goodwin). 

Recognise that Jack Straw's strong suits exclude both accountancy and humanity and allow a harmless old man to live out his last days on parole.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
